title: Towards a Decentralized IoT Onboarding for Smart Homes Using Consortium Blockchain
summary: The increasing adoption of smart home devices and IoT-based security systems presents significant opportunities to enhance convenience, safety, and risk management for homeowners and service providers. However, secure onboarding-provisioning credentials and establishing trust with cloud platforms-remains a considerable challenge.
